description:
Feel fresh all day long, with Redwin Aluminium Free Deodorant! Most deodorants use an aluminium active to help inhibit odour. Redwin Aluminium Free with Chamomile deodorant achieves the same results without the aluminium.

What is Redwin sensitive skin pump deodorant for?
  • Most deodorants use an aluminium active ingredient to help inhibit odour and prevent perspiration. Redwin Aluminium Free with Chamomile deodorant achieves the same results without the aluminium.
    • This 150ml pump pack smells great and features:
      • Witch Hazel - cools and sooths delicate skin
      • Aluminium-free formula
      • Chamomile - smells great and sooths skin.
      • Aerosol-free pump pack that is travel-safe.
        • Who is Redwin sensitive skin pump deodorant for?
          • Suitable for all skin types
            • When should I use Redwin sensitive skin pump deodorant?
              • Daily.
                • Why should I use Redwin sensitive skin pump deodorant?
                  • Aluminium based deodorants are designed to clog your pores and the aluminium is absorbed in the cells of the body very easily. To avoid putting metals into your body, use Redwin sensitive skin pump to inhibit odour
name: Redwin Anti-perspirant Deodorant Aerosol Aluminium Free Sport 150mL
